bibl.title: Monks and Property: Rhetoric, Law and Patronage in the Apophthegmata Patrum and the Papyri
bibl.note: On the gap between the ideology of the Apophthegmata and the reality of the monastery in the matter of property. - Pp. 12-15: remarks on the petition P. Oxy. XLVI, 3311 (about 373-374).
BAGNALL Roger S., Monks and Property: Rhetoric, Law, and Patronage in the Apophthegmata Patrum and the Papyri.
